description: An organization-specific definition for an organization, the patterns used to match accession numbers and optional property for resolving accession numbers.

organization_url.description: The principal URL of an organization.

whosonfirst_id.description: A valid Who's On First ID for an organization.

iiif_manifest.description: A valid URI template (RFC 6570) for deriving a IIIF manifest URL for an accession number.

oembed_profile.description: A valid URI template (RFC 6570) for deriving an OEmbed profile URL for an accession number.

object_url.description: A valid URI template (RFC 6570) for deriving object webpage URL for an accession number.
